properties.address: Church of the Ascension, Edinburgh Road, Grantham, Lincolnshire NG31 9QZ
properties.description: Wellbeing Cafe is for anyone. Baby & Toddler Group is for parents, carers and children under 5 Monday morning Wellbeing Cafe with tea, coffee, cake, crafts and table games. Tuesday morning Baby & Toddler Group with refreshments and healthy snacks for children
properties.title: Church of the Ascension Grantham

properties.address: Issac Newton Shopping Centre, Grantham, Lincolnshire NG31 6EE
properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children including Connect Over A Cuppa community coffee morning every Thursday 9.30 - 11am, there is no charge for refreshments.
properties.title: Grantham Library
Methodist and URC Church - ChristChurch L.E.P.

properties.description: Open from 25-11-2022. Term time only. Sockets for charging phones, laptops and tablets; Activities - knitting, newspapers, jigsaws; Toys suitable for pre-schoolers; Hot food will include soup and baked beans on toast.
properties.title: Ruskington Methodist Church

properties.description: Open from 03/01/2023. Our focus is supporting all those who want to stay warm this winter. You are guaranteed a warm welcome each day at the Sleaford Community Grocers. Take a seat, have a cuppa & biscuit and relax. No need to rush away. Stay and chat with one of our volunteers and keep warm. We can even supply warm clothing and blankets for you
properties.title: Sleaford Community Grocers Store

properties.address: Sleaford Library, Market Place, Sleaford NG34 7SR
properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children including Connect Over A Cuppa community coffee morning every Friday 10am-12noon, there is no charge for refreshments.
properties.title: Sleaford Library

properties.description: Open from 29-11-2022. Term-time only. Free drinks and biscuits. Toys for pre-school children. Free Wi-fi and charging points available.
